text: Ismail Hussain (1 April 1950 â€“ 24 April 2015) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the Indian Parliament representing the Barpeta (Lok Sabha constituency) for the Indian National Congress party. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Indian National Congress politicians Category:Politicians from Assam Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
